name: s4cli
params: class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3

stmt.origin: cats1cli(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), cs3(c0, c1, c2), c3)

body.origin:
|- wcel(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)))
-| wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wceq(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)))
-| wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))

body.origin: |- wceq(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), co(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cconcat, cs1(c3)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wcel(cs4(c0, c1, c2, c3), cword(universe))
-| wcel(cs3(c0, c1, c2), cword(universe))

comment: A length 4 string is a word. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Feb-2016.)
